Custom Modal Interactive

The custom modal interactive allows for any HTML markup to be placed into the modal when triggered by any other feature. This works by placing the custom HTML into the <modal> tag, and then naming the triggering function in the same node.

To see an example of the custom interactive...

CLICK TO ACTIVATE MODAL

You can also have multiple modals on the same page like any other interactive...

CLICK TO ACTIVATE MODAL
